data.name: DatabaseTitle
data.comment: Title of the database section.

data.name: docFile
data.comment: Text associated with a checkbox.

data.name: docxFile
data.comment: Text associated with a checkbox.

data.name: EmbeddedFontSupportDescription
data.value: To preserve visual fidelity across different machines, a user can choose to embed fonts within the document. Use this setting to determine whether or not embedded fonts are used when converting documents.
data.comment: Description for the embedded font support section.

data.name: EmbeddedFontSupportLabel
data.comment: Label right above the radiobuttons asking user if they want to disable embedded fonts.

data.name: EmbeddedFontSupportTitle
data.comment: Title of the embedded font support section.

data.name: FileFormatSupportDescription
data.value: Specify which file formats can be opened by the service application. If a file type is unchecked, users of this service will receive an error when attempting to open files of that type.
data.comment: Description for the file format support section.

data.name: FileFormatSupportTitle
data.comment: Title for the file format support section.

data.name: FileTypesLabel
data.comment: Label right above the file type checkboxes.

data.name: htmlFile
data.comment: Text associated with a checkbox.

data.name: JobTimeoutTitle
data.comment: Title of the job monitoring section.

data.name: MaximumMemoryUsageDescription
data.value: Specify the maximum percentage of system memory made available to the service application, as a percentage of overall system memory.
data.comment: Description of the maximum memory usage section.

data.name: MaximumMemoryUsageLabel
data.comment: Label right above the input textbox asking the user for what percentage of memory they want to allow the service to consume.

data.name: MaximumMemoryUsageTitle
data.comment: Title of the maximum memory usage section.

data.name: MissingFieldMessage
data.comment: Error message that appears near a control when the control is blank.

data.name: NoLabel
data.comment: Radio button text.

data.name: RecycleThresholdDescription
data.value: Specify the number of documents converted by a conversion process before it is restarted.
data.comment: Description for the recycle threshold section.

data.name: RecycleThresholdLabel
data.comment: Label right above the input textbox asking for the recycle threshold value.

data.name: RecycleThresholdTitle
data.comment: Title of the recycle threshold section.

data.name: rtfFile
data.comment: Text associated with a checkbox.

data.name: TotalActiveProcessesDescription
data.value: Specify the number of conversion processes created on each server available to the service application. The number of conversion processes is equivalent to the number of conversions that can be performed simultaneously.
data.comment: Description for the total active processes section.

data.name: TotalActiveProcessesLabel
data.comment: Label right above the textbox where the user will put in the number of worker processes.

data.name: TotalActiveProcessesTitle
data.comment: Title of the total active processes section.

data.name: WordServices_PageDescription
data.comment: Title of the page.

data.name: xmlFile
data.comment: Text associated with a checkbox.

data.name: YesLabel
data.comment: Radiobutton text.

data.name: JobThroughputDescription
data.value: Specify the frequency with which groups of conversions are started, and the number of conversions within each group. Setting these values too high or too low can affect performance.
data.comment: Description of the job throughput section.

data.name: JobThroughputTitle
data.comment: Title of the job throughput section.

data.name: MaxJobsPerWorkerLabel
data.value: Number of conversions to start (per conversion process):
data.comment: Label right above the input textbox asking for number of conversions per worker.

data.name: JobTimeoutDescription
data.value: Specify the length of time before conversions are monitored and, if necessary, restarted.
data.comment: Description of the job monitoring section.

data.name: JobTimeoutLabel
data.value: Length of time before conversion status is monitored (minutes):
data.comment: Label right above the textbox where the user will put in the value.

data.name: RequestTimerLabel
data.value: Frequency with which to start conversions (minutes):
data.comment: Label right above the input textbox asking for a value.

data.name: ApplicationPoolLabel
data.comment: Label adjacent to the input control describing the input.

data.name: AutoAssociateWebAppLabel
data.comment: Label above the checkbox (intentionally empty).

data.name: AutoAssociateWebAppText
data.value: Add this service application's proxy to the farm's default proxy list.
data.comment: Text describing the results of marking the checkbox.

data.name: CreateWsAppDescription
data.value: Specify the name, application pool, and database information for the service application. The settings you specify here can be changed later using the 'Manage' and 'Properties' buttons on the Manage Service Application page.
data.comment: Description at the top of the dialog telling the user the general purpose of this wizard.

data.name: CreateWsAppDialogTitle
data.value: Create New Word Automation Services Application
data.comment: Title at the top of the dialog describing the dialog.

data.name: NameLabel
data.comment: Label above the textbox.

data.name: RunInPartitionedModeLabel
data.comment: Label above the checkbox.

data.name: RunInPartitionedModeText
data.comment: Text describing what the checkbox does.

data.name: AutoAssociateWebAppDescription
data.value: Specify if this service application's proxy should be added to the default proxy list.
data.comment: Description of the auto associate web application section.

data.name: AutoAssociateWebAppTitle
data.comment: Title of the auto associate web application section.

data.name: RunInPartitionedModeDescription
data.value: Specify if the service application should run in partitioned mode.
data.comment: Description of the run in partitioned mode section.

data.name: RunInPartitionedModeTitle
data.comment: Title of the partition mode section.

data.name: WsAppNameDescription
data.value: The name for the new service application.
data.comment: Description of the word service application name section.

data.name: WsAppNameTitle
data.comment: Title of word service application name section.

data.name: MaximumConversionAttemptsDescription
data.value: Specify the maximum number of times a conversion is attempted before its status is set to Failed.
data.comment: Description of the maximum conversion attempts section.

data.name: MaximumConversionAttemptsLabel
data.comment: Label above the textbox control.

data.name: MaximumConversionAttemptsTitle
data.comment: Title of the maximum conversion attempts section.

data.name: DisableBinaryFileScanDescription
data.value:
To provide added security when loading Word 97-2003 documents, extra checks are performed before those documents are opened. These checks can have an impact on overall service performance.

Only disable this setting if you trust ALL documents loaded by the service application.
data.comment: Description of the Word 97-2003 Document Scanning section.

data.name: DisableBinaryFileScanLabel
data.comment: Label above the Word 97-2003 Document scanning radio buttons.

data.name: DisableBinaryFileScanTitle
data.comment: Title of the Word 97-2003 Document Scanning section.

data.name: WsAppPropertiesDialogTitle
data.comment: Title at the top of the properties dialog describing the dialog.

data.name: WsAppPropertiesDialogDescription
data.value: Edit the application pool and database information for the service application.
data.comment: Description at the top of the properties dialog describing the purpose of the dialog.
